author: digi_raptor
title: Valentine panda bear
review:
This is small polybag of a panda bear holding a heart on a lime green baseplate. It is a nice build and nicely represents a panda. The heart on the panda is 1 piece and fits the build nicely. I received it for free at a Lego shop/store last year for just visiting on Valentine's Day. It isn't worth much as most of the pieces are common, but it still looks good on display. It isn't great for play as it has no articulation, but I imagine children could still play with it.

Overall a nice polybag and would recommend it to people who like bears and people who just want it for display.
